intro.title: What is Copy Trading?
intro.description: Copying means allocating capital to a professional trader's management. The trader operates on Exness using their verified strategy, and you receive signals to manually replicate their trades in your own account.
intro.important: Start by defining your risk profile and total amount; then diversify across multiple strategies to reduce concentrated exposure. This is not 'easy money' ‚Äî it's education + discipline.
intro.warning_text: Define your total amount and risk profile before choosing strategies. Diversify by symbols and styles to reduce correlation.

evaluation.title: How to evaluate a strategy by numbers
evaluation.subtitle: PF and DD are not promises, they are historical. Use exposure limits at portfolio level.

hero.subtitle: Your money working for you, with strategies selected and supervised by experts. No technical complications.

how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.subtitle: It's like hiring a professional chef for your restaurant, but in trading
how_it_works.step1_desc: We review professional traders and show you only those who meet our performance and transparency standards.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Define your budget and risk level (low/medium/high). We suggest how to distribute your investment.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Professional traders execute operations. You receive updates and can stop at any time.

safety.title: Is it safe?
safety.subtitle: Your peace of mind is a priority. Here's how copy trading security works:
safety.point1_title: Your money stays in your account
safety.point1_desc: Funds remain in your Exness wallet. We don't touch your money, we only connect your account with strategies.
safety.point2_desc: Professional traders can only execute trading operations. They have no access to withdraw funds from your account.
safety.point3_desc: You can pause or stop copying at any time from your Exness panel. It's your decision, always.
safety.point4_desc: You see every executed trade, historical performance, and all metrics in real-time.

expectations.title: How much can I earn?
expectations.subtitle: Let's talk honestly about realistic expectations
expectations.realistic_desc: Professional traders seek annual returns of 10-30%, depending on risk. This is NOT 'get rich quick'. It's consistent growth with discipline.
expectations.patience_desc: Copy trading is a medium to long-term strategy. Some months you'll be up, others down. What matters is the overall trend over 6-12 months.
expectations.risk_desc: No trader wins 100% of the time. There will be losing trades. That's why we diversify and only invest money we can afford to lose.

step1.title: Step 1: What type of investor are you?
step1.subtitle: Help us understand your experience and risk tolerance
step1.investment_horizon: How long do you plan to invest?
step1.risk_question: If your investment drops 10% in a month, what would you do?
step1.risk_option_b: I wait to see what happens
step1.risk_option_c: I take advantage to invest more
step1.profile_conservative_desc: You seek stability. We prioritize strategies with less volatility even if they earn less.
step1.profile_moderate_desc: You balance risk and reward. We mix stable strategies with some more dynamic ones.
step1.profile_aggressive_desc: You tolerate ups and downs. We include strategies with higher potential but also higher risk.

step2.title: Step 2: How much do you want to invest?
step2.subtitle: Define the total amount you'll allocate to copy trading
step2.warning_desc: Only invest money you can afford to lose. Trading has real risks.
step2.diversification_note: Your amount will be distributed among 3-5 different strategies to reduce risk.

step3.title: Step 3: Suggested strategies for you
step3.subtitle: Based on your profile, we recommend these strategies
step3.no_strategies_help: Try adjusting your amount or risk profile.
step3.educational_note: This is an educational suggestion based on your profile. You can manually adjust amounts in the full catalog.
